# PocketBase Agent Skills

> Agent Skills for PocketBase development best practices

This repository contains Agent Skills following the [agentskills.io](https://agentskills.io/) format.

## Skills

- [pocketbase-best-practices](skills/pocketbase-best-practices/SKILL.md): 42 rules for PocketBase development covering collection design, API rules, authentication, SDK usage, query optimization, realtime, file handling, and deployment.

## Installation

```
npx skills add greendesertsnow/pocketbase-skills
```

## Documentation

- Skill instructions: skills/pocketbase-best-practices/SKILL.md
- Full rules reference: skills/pocketbase-best-practices/AGENTS.md
- Individual rules: skills/pocketbase-best-practices/rules/

## Links

- PocketBase docs: https://pocketbase.io/docs/
- PocketBase GitHub: https://github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase
- Agent Skills format: https://agentskills.io/
